name: @refactogent/landing
description: Refactogent landing page - marketing site for refactogent

scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:check && npm run deploy:s3 && npm run deploy:invalidate
scripts.deploy:check: node -e "try { require('./.aws-config.json'); } catch(e) { console.error('‚ùå AWS not configured. Run: npm run setup'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.deploy:s3: aws s3 sync . s3://$(node -e "console.log(require('./.aws-config.json').bucketName)") --exclude '*.sh' --exclude '*.json' --exclude '*.md' --exclude 'package.json' --exclude 'package-lock.json' --exclude 'node_modules/*' --cache-control 'public, max-age=31536000, immutable' --exclude 'index.html' && aws s3 cp index.html s3://$(node -e "console.log(require('./.aws-config.json').bucketName)")/index.html --cache-control 'public, max-age=3600, must-revalidate' --content-type 'text/html'

author: Refactogent Team
